review_text: Neither impressed nor disappointed. It's functional.
Platform is okay. Depends on which therapist you get.
The therapists are not well-trained. Felt like they were reading scripts.
This platform made therapy accessible to me. Changed my life!
The concept is good but execution could be better.
Decent app, standard therapy experience through a screen.
Affordable and convenient. I can book sessions at my own time.
